question: Will husband and wife be together if, Insha-Allah, they both go to jannat in the hereafter. Will they be together as husband and wife?
answer:
QUESTION
Since men have the rewards of beautiful women in jannat-tul-ferduos, is it possible for him to go without these maidens and instead be with his wife (if both by Allah's mercy are in jannt), as they were in this life?
ANSWER


Share:
If both die with Imaan as husband and wife, they both will be together in Jannat. The husband will still have his maidens (Hoor) in Jannat.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
